item.description:
RELEASE NOTES: This is a significant upgrade to Irony. Please backup your collections made with previous versions of Irony.
* Treat traits as FIOS (for Stellaris) * Fix #267 * Incrase line sensitivity for simple parser validation (for Stellaris) * Strip comments before validating files when falling back to simple parser (for Stellaris) * Fixed potential tooltip CTD * Bump dependencies * Minor fixes * Fix edit mode CTD
CHANGES FROM v1.16: * Updated dependencies * Patch exporter order of save operations changed a bit to be more robust * Fix custom patch and db search windows bugging out on some linux distros * Add feature to include game files in conflict solver analysis * Country types are treated in the same manner as pop_jobs (for Stellaris) * Add export mods feature along with load order * Various improvements and fixes
